amendment.description: Amendment sought to waive reporting requirements provided in the bill if sufficient funds are not available to generate the increased volume of reports.

vote.text: On agreeing to the Ellison amendment (A002) Failed by the Yeas and Nays: 191 - 227 (Roll no. 127).

action.text: House amendment not agreed to: On agreeing to the Ellison amendment (A002) Failed by the Yeas and Nays: 191 - 227 (Roll no. 127).
Amendment failed by House: On agreeing to the Ellison amendment (A002) Failed by the Yeas and Nays: 191 - 227 (Roll no. 127).
Roll call votes on amendments in House
House amendment offered/reported by : Amendment (A002) offered by Mr. Ellison.
